Description: Defines underwriting issue type, specifies when to check, and conditions for raising issue. Editable and toggleable by authorized users. Importable, exportable, and deployable into different environment.
Allows users to approve specific issue. Added to authority profiles.
Type of underwriting issues users can approve. Often contain multiple authority grants. Allow fine-grained control.
Create and test in development environment, then deploy to production environments. Rules can be urgently created in production environment.
On development server: draft (created) -> staged (ready). On production server: approved (ready) -> deployed (executes).
